metadata.title: CVE-2018-5783 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In PoDoFo 0.9.5, there is an uncontrolled memory allocation in thePoDoFo::PdfVecObjects::Reserve function (base/PdfVecObjects.h). Remoteattackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of servicevia a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
